LanguageData.VME_Defeat_Dishonorable.stages.0.label: defeated in combat
LanguageData.VME_Defeat_Dishonorable.stages.0.descrip: I was defeated in combat, this brings me great dishonor.
LanguageData.VME_SecondDefeat_Dishonorable.stages.0.d: I was defeated in combat again, my dishonor is immeasurable.
